    public static final class ConversionContext.Builder
extends Object

      • setTargetType

        public ConversionContext.Builder setTargetType​(TypeLiteral targetType)
        Sets the target type explicitly. This is required in some rare cases, e.g. injection of Provider instances, where the provider's result type must be produced.
        Parameters:
        targetType - the
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • addSupportedFormats

        public ConversionContext.Builder addSupportedFormats​(Class<?> converterType,
                                                     String... formatDescriptors)
        Add the formats provided by a PropertyConverter. This method should be called by each converters performing/trying conversion, so the user can be given feedback on the supported formats on failure.
        Parameters:
        converterType - the converters type, not null.
        formatDescriptors - the formats supported in a human readable form, e.g. as regular expressions.
        Returns:
        the builder instance, for chaining

      • build

        public ConversionContext build()
        Builds a new context instance.
        Returns:
        a new context, never null.
